summary: A KNOCKING NOISE WAS COMING FROM THE FRONT.  CONSUMER DROVE THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER, AND MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT  DRIVER'S SIDE AND PASSENGER'S SIDE UPPER BALL JOINTS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  *AK  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT SHE PURCHASED NEW TIRES AND THEY CUPPED IN NO TIME DUE TO BAD BALL JOINTS.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THAT THE SMALL BALL JOINTS ARE THE SAME BALL JOINTS IN A RECALL FOR ANOTHER YEAR/MODEL.  *TC
